alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Lower Bucks; Philadelphia (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 28 at 2:10PM EST until January 28 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Gloucester, Camden and Northwestern Burlington. In Pennsylvania, Delaware, Philadelphia and Lower Bucks. * WHEN...Until 6 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...At this level, flooding begins on the most vulnerable roads along tidal waterways. Some partial or full road closures are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The combination of high tide and freshwater input from the recent rainfall will lead to minor tidal flooding along the Delaware River this afternoon. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Delaware River at Philadelphia MLLW Categories - Minor 8.2 ft, Moderate 9.2 ft, Major 10.2 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 28/03 PM 8.5 1.8 2.9 Minor 29/04 AM 7.6 0.9 2.6 None 29/04 PM 7.9 1.2 2.5 None 30/04 AM 7.6 0.9 2.5 None 30/05 PM 8.2 1.5 2.9 Minor 31/05 AM 8.1 1.4 3.0 None Delaware River at Burlington MLLW Categories - Minor 9.3 ft, Moderate 10.3 ft, Major 11.3 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.6 ft, Moderate 2.6 ft, Major 3.6 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 28/04 PM 9.6 1.9 3.1 Minor 29/04 AM 8.7 1.0 2.6 None 29/05 PM 8.9 1.2 2.5 None 30/05 AM 8.6 0.9 2.5 None 30/05 PM 9.1 1.4 2.8 None 31/06 AM 9.1 1.4 2.9 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
